channel.title: Help please, usrgent. XLogging
channel.description:
Now I need help with the XLogging problem. I understand that the solution should be like if you're in combat and you disconnect there is a delay. But I'd like to learn how to make the disconnect delay. Thank you for your time.
Please post the entire fix if you can.

item.title: Help please, usrgent. XLogging
item.dc:creator: @Telenim Telenim
item.description:
@Telenim wrote:

Just make it so if you disconnect in combat you die. It’s what RuneScape did, if they have a bad connection then they shouldn’t risk what they want.

Read full topic
